CrawlConfig.FileNotFoundRegex: (page|resource) (you requested )?(was not|cannot be) found|Page not found|404(.0)? - ((File (or directory )?not found)|(Not Found))|HTTP Status 404|404 Not Found

AttackPolicyConfig.FalsePositiveRegex: This web browser does not support JavaScript or JavaScript in this web browser is not enabled.

AttackModulePolicy.DisplayName: Out of Band Stored Cross-site scripting (XSS)
Credentials stored in clear text in a cookie.
Sensitive data over an insecure channel

AuthConfig.SessionLossRegex: please (re)?login|have been logged out|session has expired

HTTPHeadersConfig.UserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko

TrainingParameter.Match: i have read and accept|i have read and agree|terms and conditions|terms, conditions|terms & conditions|accept|agree

TrainingParameter.Value: What make was your first car?
